data.name: Robotpencil Presents: Insight: Design Cool and Practical
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


#label_about_the_series

This tutorial is about how to have both cool and practicality in your design. It will recap the last two tutorials and then focus on how practical design could fuel coolness and vice versa.
data.about_the_game: This tutorial is about how to have both cool and practicality in your design. It will recap the last two tutorials and then focus on how practical design could fuel coolness and vice versa.
data.short_description: Videos on cool and practical design.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
